content:
I'd like to get some reviews on #10186 .
This pr defines the greedoid, one generalization of (finite) matroid and antimatroid.

I propose closing this PR because the mathlib community does not seem to contain anyone competent to review (I have asked several people now) and thus I want to conclude that this material would be better in its own repository rather than in mathlib. If there is anyone who would like to review this PR then please do so, otherwise I will close it in a few days. I'm sorry @Jihoon Hyun , this material seems to be too niche for mathlib.

This does not, by the way, mean your material is uninteresting!

But to merge something into mathlib, there needs to be somebody who understands this material well enough - both to review it and to fix proofs when something else breaks them. If that is the case in the future, this material could conceivably be added to mathlib.
Please consider putting it up as a separate repository, so that what you've done is findable!
